title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
**Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black**

**Product Description:**

Experience the refreshing benefits of a cool mist humidifier with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Designed for comfort and efficiency, this 1-gallon humidifier is perfect for medium-sized rooms, covering up to 320 square feet of space. The evaporative technology effectively disperses cool mist, creating a soothing atmosphere to alleviate dry skin, congestion, and cough.

**Key Features:**

- 1-gallon tank capacity with a low tank indicator for timely refills
- Aroma tray to release a soothing fragrance into the air
- Three-speed settings to adjust the mist output according to your needs
- Mechanical knob for easy control and operation
- Empty tank protection for safe and automatic shut-off
- Dishwasher-safe parts for effortless cleaning

**Coverage and Performance:**

- Covers up to 320 square feet of space
- Delivers 142 ml of humidity per hour
- Compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter for optimal performance

**Additional Specifications:**

- Color: Black
- Weight: 6.33 pounds
- Dimensions and additional information available upon request

**What's Included:**

- Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black
- User manual and instructions
- Aroma tray
- Replacement filter information (BestAir H62)

**Order Now and Experience the Comfort of a Cool Mist Humidifier!**
